title: Sweeper Truck DTMS-6000
description:
The DTMS-6000 Sweeper Truck is a highly efficient road-cleaning machine that is powered by a powerful diesel engine. Particularly designed for large-scale clean-up projects, this sweeper truck is suitable for roads that are municipal, highways industrial zones, and construction sites. With its large sweeping area and high-suction vacuum system and water sprayer with precision controlled the DTMS-6000 is guaranteed to provide efficient removal of debris, dust and waste in a single seamless process.

The diesel sweeper truck comes equipped with a large capacity waste bin, a litter picker integrated and a longer fuel autonomy, which makes it the ideal vehicle for sanitation in cities. The robust chassis, the operator-friendly cabin, and sophisticated control system guarantee safety, comfort and efficiency throughout every cleaning process.

This DTMS-6000 sweeper truck is a popular option in Swachh Bharat Mission, Smart City Projects as well as urban sanitation contracts. It delivers the most powerful cleaning power and long-term efficiency for cities of the future.
keyFeatures: High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 100L water and 1000L dust collection for extended operation.
Powerful Performance – Best performance in heavy-duty sweeping operations, as it utilizes high torque from the diesel engines.
Long Operating Range – Able to run for several hours continuously without frequent refuels.
Integrated Litter Picker – Enhanced efficiency along edges and corners of curbs for the easy collection of larger forms of litter such as wrappers and bottles.
High Suction Capacity – Efficiently lifts dust, gravel, leaves, and plastic litter from roads.
Large Waste Hopper – Less operational pauses bringing increased efficiency by decreasing the need for frequent unloads.
Strong Water Spraying System – Improves cleaning quality by reducing airborne dust while cleaning.
Tough Conditions Are No Problem – Functions properly in any weather or terrain.
Best For City Use – Best suited for major roads, urban roads, and large industrial cities.
